title: Group portrait of beauty contest participants, possibly including Jean Johnson eleventh from right, Kathleen Holloway ninth from right, and Ruth Barnett sixth from right, holding numbered cards, and wearing bathing suits and sashes reading "...Cardwell Dawson, ...Clothes, ...Hotel, ...Walker, ...Hawkins," at Sully's pool in South Park, for Business and Professional Men's Association picnic
medium: black and white: Agfa supreme pan Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
